name: BeeCORP.
description:
2D platformer puzzle game. - Beta V1

In the Wysteria National Park, there lived a special breed of bees with easily genetically modifiable genes. Scientists experimented on these bees and took great pride in their work. One day, a large storm blew in and whisked away one of the youngest newborn bees. He is cast far from home and made it his mission to bring him back. Scientists were alerted of this and sent out wasps, mutated out of bees, and one large sentry Queen bee to destroy him, thinking he escaped on purpose. Your job is to get back home in one or several pieces
